metadata.description: The id of IoT Hub instance to which the workbook will be associated
The id of Application Insights instance to which the workbook will be associated for fetching telemetry entries
The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List. This name must be unique within a resource group.
The unique guid for this workbook instance

parameters.name: InsightsMetricsExists

content.query:
let connectivityLost = customMetrics
| where name == "StationConnectivityLost"
| project name, valueSum
| summarize Count = sum(valueSum) by name
| take 1;
customMetrics
| where name == "StationConnectivityLost"
| make-series Trend = avg(value) default = 0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by name
| join (connectivityLost) on name
| project-away name, timestamp

let receiveWindowMisses = customMetrics
| where name == "ReceiveWindowMisses"
| order by timestamp desc
| project name, valueSum
| summarize Sum = sum(valueSum) by name
| take 1;
customMetrics
| where name == "ReceiveWindowMisses"
| make-series Trend = sum(valueSum) default = 0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by name
| join (receiveWindowMisses) on name
| project-away name, timestamp

let unhandledExceptions = customMetrics
| where name == "UnhandledExceptions"
| project name, valueSum, exceptionKeyword = "Exception"
| summarize Count = sum(valueSum) by name, exceptionKeyword
| take 1;
customMetrics
| where name == "UnhandledExceptions"
| make-series Trend = avg(value) default = 0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by name
| join (unhandledExceptions) on name
| project-away name, timestamp

let c2dmessagesTooLong = customMetrics
| where name == "C2DMessageTooLong"
| project name, valueSum
| summarize Count = sum(valueSum) by name
| take 1;
customMetrics
| where name == "C2DMessageTooLong"
| make-series Trend = avg(value) default = 0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by name
| join (c2dmessagesTooLong) on name
| project-away name, timestamp
content.noDataMessage: No C2D messages that were too long detected

content.query:
let activeConnections = customMetrics
| where name == "ActiveStationConnections"
| order by timestamp desc
| project value, name
| take 1;
customMetrics
| where name == "ActiveStationConnections"
| make-series Trend = avg(value) default = 0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by name
| join (activeConnections) on name
| project-away name, timestamp

let deliveryLatency = customMetrics
| where name == "D2CMessageDeliveryLatency"
| order by timestamp desc
| take 1;
customMetrics
| where name == "D2CMessageDeliveryLatency"
| make-series Trend = avg(value) default = 0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by name
| join (deliveryLatency) on name
| project-away name, timestamp

let joinRequests = customMetrics
| where name == "JoinRequests"
| order by timestamp desc
| project name, valueSum
| summarize JoinRequestSum = sum(valueSum) by name
| take 1;
customMetrics
| where name == "JoinRequests"
| make-series Trend = sum(valueSum) default = 0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by name
| join (joinRequests) on name
| project-away name, timestamp

let messageSizes = customMetrics
| where name == "D2CMessageSize"
| order by timestamp desc
| summarize D2CMessageSize = avg(value) by name;
customMetrics
| where name == "D2CMessageSize"
| make-series Hist = sum(valueSum) default = 0 on value from 5.0 to 250.0 step 5.0 by name
| join (messageSizes) on name

let sum = customMetrics
| where name == "D2CMessagesReceived"
| order by timestamp desc
| project name, valueSum
| summarize Sum = sum(valueSum) by name
| take 1;
customMetrics
| where name == "D2CMessagesReceived"
| make-series Trend = sum(valueSum) default = 0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by name
| join (sum) on name
| project-away name, timestamp

let rawData = dependencies
| project duration, name, type, timestamp, EndpointWithoutDeviceId = extract("(.*)/[0-9a-zA-Z]{16}$", 1, name)
| project duration, type, timestamp, Endpoint = iff(isempty(EndpointWithoutDeviceId), name, EndpointWithoutDeviceId);
let history = rawData
| make-series avg(duration) default=0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by Endpoint
| project-away timestamp;
rawData
| summarize Mean = avg(duration), (p95) = percentiles(duration, 95), Requests = count() by type, Endpoint
| join (history) on Endpoint
| order by Requests desc

// Set thresholds
let hostMemPercentThreshold = 80;
let hostCpuPercentThreshold = 80;
let hostDiskPercentThreshold = 90;
let localMessagesSentThreshold = 0;
let upstreamMessagesSentThreshold = 0;
let qlenThreshold = 100;
let noDataPanicThreshold1Minutes = 30;
let noDataPanicThreshold2Minutes = 120;
let timeBin = 5m; // set to how often the devices send data
let startTime = {timeRange:start};
let endTime =  {timeRange:end};
//query
let cpu_percent = InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated > startTime and TimeGenerated < endTime
    | where Name == "edgeAgent_used_cpu_percent" and Tags contains "host" and Tags contains "0.99"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
    | extend value = toint(Val)
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
    top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
    top-nested of value by Ignore2=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | summarize p95HostCpu=max(value) by device;
let totalMemByDevice = InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated > startTime and TimeGenerated < endTime
    | where Name == "edgeAgent_total_memory_bytes" and Tags contains "host"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
    | extend value = tolong(Val)
    | project device, value, TimeGenerated
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
    top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
    top-nested of value by Ignore2=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | summarize total_bytes=max(value) by device;
let memUsedPercent = InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated > startTime and TimeGenerated < endTime
    | where Name == "edgeAgent_used_memory_bytes" and Tags contains "host"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
    top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
    top-nested of Val by Ignore2=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | extend used_bytes = tolong(Val) 
    | project device, used_bytes, TimeGenerated
    | join kind=leftouter totalMemByDevice on $left.device == $right.device
    | extend mem_used_percent = (todouble(used_bytes) / todouble(total_bytes)) * 100
    | extend mem_used_percent = round(mem_used_percent, 0)
    | summarize p95HostMem=max(mem_used_percent) by device;
let cpu_and_mem = memUsedPercent
    | join cpu_percent on $left.device == $right.device
    | project-away device1;
let totalBytesByDevice = InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated > startTime and TimeGenerated < endTime
    | where Name == "edgeAgent_total_disk_space_bytes"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
    | extend value = tolong(Val)
    | extend diskname = tostring(dimensions.disk_name)
    | extend diskfs = tostring(dimensions.disk_filesystem)
    | where diskfs != "overlay"
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
    top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
    top-nested of value by Ignore2=max(1),
    top-nested of diskname by Ignore3=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | project device, diskname, value, TimeGenerated
    | summarize Bytes=max(value) by device, diskname
    | summarize totalBytes=sum(Bytes) by device;
let used_disk_trend = InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated > startTime and TimeGenerated < endTime
    | where Name == "edgeAgent_available_disk_space_bytes"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
    | extend value = tolong(Val)
    | extend diskname = tostring(dimensions.disk_name)
    | extend diskfs = tostring(dimensions.disk_filesystem)
    | where diskfs != "overlay"
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
    top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
    top-nested of value by Ignore2=max(1),
    top-nested of diskname by Ignore3=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | project device, diskname, value, TimeGenerated
    | summarize Bytes=max(value) by device, diskname, TimeGenerated
    | summarize availBytes=sum(Bytes) by device, TimeGenerated
    | join kind=leftouter
        totalBytesByDevice
        on $left.device == $right.device
    | extend percentUsed = round((todouble(totalBytes) - todouble(availBytes)) / todouble(totalBytes) * 100, 0)
    | project TimeGenerated, device, percentUsed
    | summarize p95Disk=max(percentUsed) by device;
let cpu_mem_disk = cpu_and_mem
    | join
        used_disk_trend
        on $left.device == $right.device
    | project-away device1;
let p95QlenByDevice = InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated > startTime
    | where TimeGenerated < endTime
    | where Name == "edgehub_queue_length"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
    | extend ep = tostring(dimensions.endpoint)
    | extend qlen = toint(Val)
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
    top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
    top-nested of qlen by Ignore2=max(1),
    top-nested of ep by Ignore3=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | project device, qlen, ep, TimeGenerated
    | summarize sum(qlen) by TimeGenerated, device
    | summarize p95QLen = max(sum_qlen) by device;
let lastUpdateTimeByDevice = InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated > startTime
    | where TimeGenerated < endTime
    | where Name == "edgehub_gettwin_total" or Name == "edgeAgent_total_time_running_correctly_seconds"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
    | project TimeGenerated, device
    | summarize lastUpdateTime=max(TimeGenerated) by device;
let p95QlenByDeviceAndLastUpdate = p95QlenByDevice 
    | join kind=rightouter lastUpdateTimeByDevice on device
    | extend device=device1
    | project-away device1
    | extend lastUpdatedSeconds = tolong(datetime_diff('second', now(), lastUpdateTime))
    | extend lastUpdatedMins = tolong(datetime_diff('minute', now(), lastUpdateTime))
    | extend lastUpdatedHours = tolong(datetime_diff('hour', now(), lastUpdateTime))
    | extend lastUpdatedDays = tolong(datetime_diff('day', now(), lastUpdateTime))
    | extend agoText = case(lastUpdatedSeconds <= 60, strcat("seen ", lastUpdatedSeconds, iff(lastUpdatedSeconds == 1, " sec ago", " secs ago")),
        lastUpdatedSeconds <= 3600, strcat("seen ", lastUpdatedMins, iff(lastUpdatedMins == 1, " min ago", " mins ago")), 
        lastUpdatedSeconds <= 86400, strcat("seen ", lastUpdatedHours, iff(lastUpdatedHours == 1, " hr ago", " hrs ago")),
        strcat("ðŸ‘€ ", lastUpdatedDays, iff(lastUpdatedDays > 1, " days ago", " day ago")))
    | project agoText, device, p95QLen, lastUpdatedMins;
let qlenAndLastUpdate = p95QlenByDeviceAndLastUpdate
    | join kind=leftouter
        cpu_mem_disk
        on $left.device == $right.device
    | project-away device1;
// Local and upstream messages
let recentUpstreamMessageCount = InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated > startTime and TimeGenerated < endTime
    | where Name == "edgehub_messages_sent_total"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
    | extend target = trim_start(@"[^/]+/", extractjson("$.to", tostring(dimensions), typeof(string)))
    | where target contains "Upstream"
    | extend source = strcat(device, "::", trim_start(@"[^/]+/", tostring(dimensions.from)))
    | extend messages = toint(Val)
    | extend sourceTarget = strcat(source, "::", target)
    | project TimeGenerated, source, sourceTarget, messages, device
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
    top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
    top-nested of messages by Ignore2=max(1),
    top-nested of source by Ignore3=max(1),
    top-nested of sourceTarget by Ignore4=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | order by device, source, sourceTarget, TimeGenerated
    | serialize
    | extend nextCount = next(messages, 1)
    | extend nextSourceTarget= next(sourceTarget, 1)
    | extend diff = iff((messages - nextCount) >= 0, messages - nextCount, 0)
    | where sourceTarget == nextSourceTarget and diff >= 0
    | summarize maxSourceTargetCount=max(diff) by sourceTarget, device
    | summarize recentUpstreamMessages=sum(maxSourceTargetCount) by device;
let recentLocalMessageCount = InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated > startTime and TimeGenerated < endTime
    | where Name == "edgehub_messages_sent_total"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
    | extend target = trim_start(@"[^/]+/", extractjson("$.to", tostring(dimensions), typeof(string)))
    | where target !contains "Upstream"
    | extend source = strcat(device, "::", trim_start(@"[^/]+/", tostring(dimensions.from)))
    | extend messages = toint(Val)
    | extend sourceTarget = strcat(source, "::", target)
    | project TimeGenerated, source, sourceTarget, messages, device
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
    top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
    top-nested of messages by Ignore2=max(1),
    top-nested of source by Ignore3=max(1),
    top-nested of sourceTarget by Ignore4=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | order by device, source, sourceTarget, TimeGenerated
    | serialize
    | extend nextCount = next(messages, 1)
    | extend nextSourceTarget= next(sourceTarget, 1)
    | extend diff = iff((messages - nextCount) >= 0, messages - nextCount, 0)
    | where sourceTarget == nextSourceTarget and diff >= 0
    | summarize maxSourceTargetCount=max(diff) by sourceTarget, device
    | summarize recentLocalMessages=sum(maxSourceTargetCount) by device;
let recentMessageCount = recentLocalMessageCount
    | join kind=fullouter recentUpstreamMessageCount on device
    | extend device=device1
    | project-away device1;
// Final join
qlenAndLastUpdate
| join kind=leftouter recentMessageCount on device
| project-away device1
| extend hostMemPercentThreshold = hostMemPercentThreshold
| extend hostCpuPercentThreshold = hostCpuPercentThreshold
| extend hostDiskPercentThreshold = hostDiskPercentThreshold
| extend localMessagesSentThreshold = localMessagesSentThreshold
| extend upstreamMessagesSentThreshold = upstreamMessagesSentThreshold
| extend qlenThreshold = qlenThreshold
| extend noDataPanicThreshold1Minutes = noDataPanicThreshold1Minutes
| extend noDataPanicThreshold2Minutes = noDataPanicThreshold2Minutes
| extend healthIndicator = iff((p95HostMem < hostMemPercentThreshold and 
    p95HostCpu < hostCpuPercentThreshold and
    p95Disk < hostDiskPercentThreshold and
    p95QLen < qlenThreshold), 
    iff(lastUpdatedMins < noDataPanicThreshold1Minutes,
    0,
    1),
    2)
| extend healthIndicator = iff(lastUpdatedMins > noDataPanicThreshold1Minutes,
    1,
    iff((isnull(p95HostMem) or p95HostMem < hostMemPercentThreshold) and 
    (isnull(p95HostCpu) or p95HostCpu < hostCpuPercentThreshold) and
    (isnull(p95Disk) or p95Disk < hostDiskPercentThreshold) and
    (isnull(p95QLen) or p95QLen < qlenThreshold) and
    (recentLocalMessages >= localMessagesSentThreshold or 
    localMessagesSentThreshold == 0 
    ) and
    (recentUpstreamMessages >= upstreamMessagesSentThreshold or 
    upstreamMessagesSentThreshold == 0 
    ),
    0,
    2)) 
| extend healthText = case(healthIndicator == 0, "Healthy",
    healthIndicator == 1, "Unhealthy",
    healthIndicator == 2, "Unhealthy",
    "Unknown")
| extend colorHelper = case(lastUpdatedMins > noDataPanicThreshold2Minutes, -2,
    lastUpdatedMins > noDataPanicThreshold1Minutes, -1,
    healthIndicator)

tooltipFormat.tooltip: Number of messages received by edge hub

content.query:
let timeBin = 5m; // set to how often the devices send data
let startTime = {timeRange:start};
let endTime =  {timeRange:end};
let lastUpdateTimeByDevice = InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated > startTime
    | where TimeGenerated < endTime
    | where Name == "edgehub_gettwin_total" or Name == "edgeAgent_total_time_running_correctly_seconds"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
    | project TimeGenerated, device
    | summarize lastUpdateTime=max(TimeGenerated) by device
    | order by lastUpdateTime;
let totalUpstreamMessageCount = InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated > startTime and TimeGenerated < endTime
    | where Name == "edgehub_messages_sent_total"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
    | extend target = trim_start(@"[^/]+/", extractjson("$.to", tostring(dimensions), typeof(string)))
    | where target contains "Upstream"
    | extend source = strcat(device, "::", trim_start(@"[^/]+/", tostring(dimensions.from)))
    | extend messages = toint(Val)
    | extend sourceTarget = strcat(source, "::", target)
    | project TimeGenerated, source, sourceTarget, messages, device
    | order by device, source, sourceTarget, TimeGenerated
    | serialize
    | extend nextCount = next(messages, 1)
    | extend nextSourceTarget= next(sourceTarget, 1)
    | extend diff = iff((messages - nextCount) >= 0, messages - nextCount, 0)
    | where sourceTarget == nextSourceTarget and diff >= 0
    | summarize sumSourceTargetCount=sum(diff) by sourceTarget, device
    | summarize UpstreamMessages=sum(sumSourceTargetCount) by device;
let totalLocalMessageCount = InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated > startTime and TimeGenerated < endTime
    | where Name == "edgehub_messages_sent_total"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
    | extend target = trim_start(@"[^/]+/", extractjson("$.to", tostring(dimensions), typeof(string)))
    | where target !contains "Upstream"
    | extend source = strcat(device, "::", trim_start(@"[^/]+/", tostring(dimensions.from)))
    | extend messages = toint(Val)
    | extend sourceTarget = strcat(source, "::", target)
    | project TimeGenerated, source, sourceTarget, messages, device
    | order by device, source, sourceTarget, TimeGenerated
    | serialize
    | extend nextCount = next(messages, 1)
    | extend nextSourceTarget= next(sourceTarget, 1)
    | extend diff = iff((messages - nextCount) >= 0, messages - nextCount, 0)
    | where sourceTarget == nextSourceTarget and diff >= 0
    | summarize sumSourceTargetCount=sum(diff) by sourceTarget, device
    | summarize LocalMessages=sum(sumSourceTargetCount) by device;
let totalMessageCount = totalLocalMessageCount
    | join kind=fullouter totalUpstreamMessageCount on device
    | extend device=device1
    | project-away device1;
// Final query
lastUpdateTimeByDevice
| join kind=fullouter totalMessageCount on device
| project-away device1
| order by lastUpdateTime
content.title: Active devices ({$rowCount})

content.query:
AlertsManagementResources | where type =~ 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/alerts'
| where todatetime(properties.essentials.startDateTime) {timeRange}
| where "*" in ({alertResources}) or properties.essentials.targetResource in~ ({alertResources})
| extend State=tostring(properties.essentials.alertState)
| where "*" in ({State}) or State in ({State})
| summarize Count=count(), New=countif(State=="New"), 
Acknowledged=countif(State=="Acknowledged"), 
Closed=countif(State=="Closed") 
by Severity=tostring(properties.essentials.severity)
| order by Severity asc

AlertsManagementResources | where type =~ 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/alerts'
| where todatetime(properties.essentials.startDateTime) {timeRange}  
| extend Severity=tostring(properties.essentials.severity)
| where Severity in ({Severity})
| extend State=tostring(properties.essentials.alertState)
| project AlertId=id, StartTime=todatetime(tostring(properties.essentials.startDateTime)), Severity, State=tostring(properties.essentials.alertState), Name=name, TargetResource = tostring(properties.essentials.targetResource), MonitorService = tostring(properties.essentials.monitorService), SignalType=tostring(properties.essentials.signalType), Description=tostring(properties.essentials.description)

AlertsManagementResources | where type =~ 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/alerts'
| where todatetime(properties.essentials.startDateTime) {timeRange}  
| extend State=tostring(properties.essentials.alertState)
| where "*" in ({State}) or State in ({State})
| where "*" in ({alertResources}) or properties.essentials.targetResource in~ ({alertResources})
| summarize Alerts=count(), New=countif(State=="New"), 
Acknowledged=countif(State=="Acknowledged"), 
Closed=countif(State=="Closed")
by Resource=tostring(properties.essentials.targetResource )
| order by Alerts desc
content.title: Alerts by Region
